author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Addressing issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39453
There was a crash in data WFs because of an event where too many muons per link were allowed; this PR limits the number of muons per link.

@sunilUIET FYI

#### PR validation:

The data WF that was crashing doesnt crash anymore
title: [L1T] bugfix in RegionalMuonGmtPacker
